title: pulsefire ezreal/ dj sona interaction bug
body: i encountered a bug in the early game. it was between the dj sona skin, and the pulsefire ezreal skin. sona q aura'd, and from then on it gave my character a white box on the mini map, didnt say the correct character killed somone, as well as instead of a normal run, it looked as though home guard enchant to boots was on. it still moved normal speed...... i could not see the auto attack animation, trifore proc did not always show on my hands. also after level 16 as i should occasionally float from the jet pack it was interupted by the silly running animation. ty for your time.

replies.body:
Hey farcl, 

We had disabled PFE  temporarily due to this issue. When we pushed a fix to live, you would have needed to download a quick patch upon logging in again to receive the fix. 

Try relogging your client. If you're still having issues, please feel free to update this thread!
